name: The Board
description:
In The Board you have to stack a plethora of awkward objects to beat each dastardly devised level. If they fall before the timer, you lose, if they stay standing you get to try the next tricky level. How far will you get?

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

The board was created for a final year game design and implementation module. Students are tasked with designing and creating a mobile game for Android mobile devices. This is a solo project that tests students design, C# + Unity and artistic skills.

CONTROLS

  • Touch controls. Tap object buttons to select them and then top the scene to place them.

REQUIREMENTS

  • Android device.

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 1 x Level 6 Student

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
